markdown:
| icon           = poe2 plain_letter icon.png
| description    = This letter seems to have been written hastily.

"Watcher

Please. We need your help. We found a fissure. Collapse. Disturbed the spirits.

My son is trapped. The spirits attack all who come near.

We are on the island southwest of Neketaka.

Please hurry."

'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Quest item }} in {{poe2}}.
__NOTOC__

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* At the end of [A Sorcerer and a Gentleman](/aSorcererAndAGentleman/), you can choose to give [Malnaj](/malnaj/) false information regarding the wherabouts of [Remaro](/remaro/). After five in-game days, you will recieve this missive pointing you toward an island southwest of [Neketaka](/neketaka/) (the northern island of [Karatapu Channel](/karatapuChannel/)), where you will find a new marker "Call for help" next to [Oathbinder's Sanctum](/oathbindersSanctum/). After interacting with the camp, Malnaj and her crew emerges to ambush you in an act of revenge. ''A snotty voice call out to you. "Oh thank the gods you're here, were all saved."'' (includes spelling mistakes)

## Gallery

<gallery widths=200px>
 Call for help.png | Location south of Neketaka
</gallery>

==Usage==
* At the end of [[A Sorcerer and a Gentleman]], you can choose to give [[Malnaj]] false information regarding the wherabouts of [[Remaro]].
